description: Demonstrators say a government-selected board will ruin the autonomy of a top arts university.
title: Hungary: Protesters rally against university 'takeover' in Budapest
title_page: Hungary: Protesters rally against university 'takeover' in Budapest - BBC News
maintext: The new head of the board, Attila Vidnyanszky, said on Tuesday they were open to dialogue. However he also said he wanted a "different kind of thinking" at the university, adding that existing classes would be kept with some emphasis placed on patriotism and Christianity.
